ygData.subject: Re: Who is the pet?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I think my pet is out to get me.  I dont know if its because of all the recent nerfs or what, but my pet is trying to kill me I tell you.  I was in
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I think my pet is out to get me. I dont know if its because of all the recent nerfs or what, but my pet is trying to kill me I tell you. I was in lowerguk camping assasin, when all of a sudden my pet pulls a bunch of green mobs from downstairs. Not only that, but he starts cackling like a maniac as 4 wan ghoul knights rush up to kill us. As I try to do some crowd control with screaming terror, my pet stops attacking the one he's fighting and starts hitting the ST'd one, thus breaking the mez.
-----Original Message-----
From: Dicey <shonn@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, February 24, 2000 1:49 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Who is the pet?


From: "Dicey" <shonn@...>


Ever feel like you're the pet and Gobantik is the real PC. I mean you pull for Gobantik, you buff Gobantik, you heal Gobantik, you furnish Gobantik with weapons, you make it easy for Gobantik to kill the mob with things like DoT's and Fear and Root. Gobantik doesn't have to waste time running all over Norrath, you carry him safely in your backpack until its time to kill something. Think Gobantik ever cons you and thinks, "Damn, I got a blue Necromancer this time!"? Yeah sure, Gobantik talks like a kiss up, but he knows who is really in charge!

Dicey
34th level Skeleton pet
